text: Benjamin John Whitrow (17 February 1937 â€“ 28 September 2017) was an English actor. He was nominated for the BAFTA TV Award for Best Actor for his role as Mr Bennet in the 1995 BBC version of Pride and Prejudice. Whitrow voiced the role of Fowler in the 2000 animated movie Chicken Run. His other movie appearances include Quadrophenia (1979), Personal Services (1987) and Bomber (2009).
